snippet.title: How to Use If Else in Python! (2018)
snippet.description:
For those who want to keep learning:
Java For Absolute Beginners: http://bit.ly/2YQ0Hz8
Self-Driving Cars: http://bit.ly/30Dzrpn
Artificial Intelligence: http://bit.ly/2sMkWmE
2D Game Development: http://bit.ly/2XMl9EI
3D Game Development: http://bit.ly/2JzuEhD
Web Development: http://bit.ly/2XWl3FS
App Development (iOS): http://bit.ly/2Ydjho1
App Development (Android): http://bit.ly/2GePdhj
Learn Python: http://bit.ly/2XMCbCw
Learn C++: http://bit.ly/30AuaxE

- This video will teach you about if else statements in almost ANY programming language (Python, Java, C ...). I give you the text file for whichever language you need.

I believe that coding should be made simpler for beginners to understand. So you can have fun, rather than be stuck! If you believe we should cut the confusion out of coding, consider subscribing!

Template code for other languages (Python, Java, Javascript, Swift, C, C++, C#, Ruby, PHP, Objective-C and Perl): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DJ2E24ztNVw5Deo1INO_VLKf1zgDMdHk/view?usp=sharing

Remember, if you want more templates, let me know by liking the video and commenting on which concepts you'd like to see!

I hope this video helped you out. Let me know if you found this video on how to use if else in python useful by liking the video or sharing with a friend! Thank you all for your support!
tags: how to use if else in python
how to use if else statements
